thread.title: Stylish Hotel with Great Service in the Financial District
thread.title_full: Stylish Hotel with Great Service in the Financial District - Review of Gild Hall, a Thompson Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: benjaminh725
title: Stylish Hotel with Great Service in the Financial District
text: The Financial District is an underrated neighborhood to visit. The neighborhood is much quieter than Midtown and has subway connections to anywhere you would want to go. Gild Hall has gorgeous interiors, comfortable beds, and great service. I'm an unabashed fan of Thompson hotels in general, but this one is really a gem.
